thread.section_title: The Waldorf Hilton London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Return visit 50 years later
thread.title_full: Return visit 50 years later - Review of The Waldorf Hilton London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: OldseadogOxford_UK
title: Return visit 50 years later
text:
My wife and I stayed overnight Saturday/Sunday 25th March for the reason of a concert at the Royal Albert Hall.
I first knew this hotel as the Waldorf Astoria,however our visit was very pleasant as the staff were exceptionally friendly and efficient. Our room met all our requirements and was very quiet and comfortable.
Breakfast was more than adequate,although the room was rather noisy,staff were very polite and numerous.
Excellent position for walking and seeing the sights of London both sides of the river.Public transport just outside.
Further visit to be arranged.
